item.title: Difference Between Junior and Senior Dev
item.description: Why do we have roles? People like naming things Upside It is easier to talk about categories or job levels then to always declare the full function or expertise of a person or group, i.e. “That task can be handled by one of the junior devs” vs. “That task can be handled by one of the devs that know our architecture, but are not yet experienced in the front end code”
